      • Weapon

        public Weapon()
        Default constructor

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(java.lang.String name,
      int difficulty,
      int damage,
      Weapon.ConcealT conceal,
      Weapon.WeaponT wType)
        Use for initializing a melee weapon
        Parameters:
        name - - name of weapon
        difficulty - - difficulty of roll to use weapon
        damage - - damage weapon deals
        conceal - - how and if weapon can be concealed
        wType - - the type of weapon. Will be MELEE or FIREARM

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(java.lang.String name,
      int difficulty,
      int damage,
      Weapon.ConcealT conceal,
      Weapon.WeaponT wType,
      boolean scope,
      int range,
      int rate,
      int clipSize)
        Use for initializing a firearm
        Parameters:
        name - - name of weapon
        difficulty - - difficulty of roll to use weapon
        damage - - damage weapon deals
        conceal - - how and if weapon can be concealed
        wType - - the type of weapon. Will be MELEE or FIREARM
        scope - - true if weapon has a scope
        range - - range the shot can hit before increasing difficulty
        rate - - how fast the gun can fire
        clipSize - - number of bullets in the clip
